snippet.title: Rayman Junior Intro
snippet.description:
Intro to the PS1 game 'Rayman Junior', also known as 'Maths and English with Rayman' or 'Amazing Learning Games with Rayman'.  It's basically the first Rayman game cut short and with questions designed for kids as an edutainment game.  This the UK version BTW so the voices are different [if badly muffled on this version, half the time you can't make out what the Magician's saying].  

It's not as easy as you think though.  And if you get a question wrong, you DIE!
